nodes.bodyText: Not a change of yours, but I think we can declare this as final
good catch, both node and nodeContainerFactory are final, they cannot be modified by specializations
just to double check whether we don't want to expose this outside of this package? default access modifier is ok or should we use public?

In this case "default" scope is intentional,  although open to debate
As pro we prevent this class to be referenced outside this package (which is why is "default" is used, we do not want that under any circunstance)
As cons we prevent any other specialization outside this package, which is probably fine, to force all potential specializations to live in the same package.
So Ill kept this for now.

Actually this private field nodeContainer should be removed and use parent one
